availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.collection: Assistant Adjutant General Letter Book - No. 1 ; 5 Sept 1863 - 2 Feb 1864

body.p: Private Caleb Garey of Company "E" 17th Ky Vols Inf is hereby discharged the service of the State of Kentucky, he having been refused as a recruit & never mustered into the United States Service, from the 30th day of December 1861.
This discharge to be a waiver of the claim for Pay, Bounty, Allowances &c to Garey for services rendered.

By order of the Governor
John Boyle
Adjt Gen of Ky
